item.title: Digital garden
item.description: A digital garden is a place for thoughts, knowledge and ideas to grow. I will not follow the original ethos to the T, but it’s a very nice read nonetheless.
item.content:encoded:
A digital garden is a place for thoughts, knowledge and ideas to grow.

I will not follow the original ethos to the T, but it’s a very nice read nonetheless.
